Value: OZ Minerals Limited engages in the exploration, development, mining, and processing of mining projects in Australia. The company primarily explores for copper, gold, silver, nickel, iron oxide, zinc, and lead deposits. In addition, it has interests in the Paraiso, Pantera, Lannavaara, Coompana, and Eloise properties. The company was incorporated in 1932 and is headquartered in Adelaide, Australia.
